    • Method Detail

      • getStudentsWithinPeriod

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Student> getStudentsWithinPeriod(java.lang.String datetime)
        Returns all students found in database within the previous 15 minutes query window of the given time
        Parameters:
        datetime - both date and time input by user
        Returns:
        ArrayLists students that are in school for the last 15 minutes starting from the input datetime

      • processBreakdown

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> processBreakdown(java.lang.String datetime,
                                                                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> order)
        Returns all students found in database within the previous 15 minutes query window of the given time and process the breakdown based on their year, gender, and school
        Parameters:
        datetime - both date and time input by user
        order - by which the user want to sort the breakdown by
        Returns:
        ArrayList objects that contains the breakdown of students either by year, gender or school

      • breakdownByYear

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> breakdownByYear(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> order,
                                                                    java.util.ArrayList<Student> student_list)
        Returns breakdown of student list by their year. Only students with the admission year from 2010 to 2014 will be returned
        Parameters:
        order - the input order in which to sort by e.g. year, gender, school
        student_list - the list of students within the 15 minutes query window
        Returns:
        ArrayList objects that contains the breakdown of students by year

      • breakdownByGender

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> breakdownByGender(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> order,
                                                                      java.util.ArrayList<Student> student_list)
        Returns breakdown of student list by their gender ( i.e.:M or F)
        Parameters:
        order - the input order in which to sort by e.g. year, gender, school
        student_list - the list of students within the 15 minutes query window
        Returns:
        ArrayList objects that contains the breakdown of students by gender

      • breakdownBySchool

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> breakdownBySchool(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> order,
                                                                      java.util.ArrayList<Student> student_list)
        Returns breakdown of student list by their school (i.e.: business, economics, law, sis, accountancy, or socsc)
        Parameters:
        order - the input order in which to sort by e.g. year, gender, school
        student_list - the list of students within the 15 minutes query window
        Returns:
        ArrayList objects that contains the breakdown of students by school
